channel.title: How do i
channel.description:
Ive gotten a fucked up issue with movie maker.. when i open it it crashes after 5 sec and hence its installed with windows i got no idea how to reinstall.
any1 knows?

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

[quote=“Rajae, post:3, topic:172860”]Go to add/remove programs, then go to remove components, check there for windows movie maker.

Or just try to go to the microsoft site and download it. Just run the installer and it might say repair or reinstall or delete.[/quote]

Yeah, I kinda said that, correct? You just added a bit of details?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Rajae Rajae
item.description:
@Rajae wrote:

Go to add/remove programs, then go to remove components, check there for windows movie maker.

Or just try to go to the microsoft site and download it. Just run the installer and it might say repair or reinstall or delete.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

Go to you’re control panel, go to Add or Remove program list. See if it’s there, if it is remove it. Then re-install?

Read full topic
